Unnamed Package

  • Class
    Description
    BankAccount
    Represents a bank account with card details and ownership information.
    Investor
    Represents an investor who owns a portfolio and can log in to the system.
    Investor.InvestorBuilder
    Builder class to construct an Investor instance.
    Main
    Main class to manage user interactions with the portfolio management system.
    Portfolio
    Represents a financial portfolio for an investor, including owned assets and linked bank accounts.
    TheBank
    Represents a simplified bank system that manages bank accounts.
    Validation
    Interface for validation methods related to user input such as email, name, password, numeric checks, and date formatting.
    ValidationImpl
    Implementation of the Validation interface providing input validation methods for email, name, password, numbers, and dates.
